name: admin.users.remove
desc: Remove a user from a workspace.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user to remove.

errors.cannot_modify_primary_owner: The primary owner cannot be modified.
errors.failed_to_remove_user_from_workspace: Removing this user from the workspace failed.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.invalid_auth: The request could not be authorized
errors.invalid_permissions: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
errors.user_already_deleted: The requested user has already been marked as deleted.
